description:
Want to live in a perfectly clean environment and make it sparkle? Follow the steps given below and let others think you hire professionals to do the job for you. You will not need to purchase expensive cleaning products if you learn a few smart secrets. Here they are:想生活在一个干净的生活环境中、让一切光洁发亮？那就跟着以下步骤，让别人误以为你雇了一个专家来打点生活。无需购买昂贵的清洁用品，只需要一些小妙招，请接招~

1. Cleaning The Toilet With Coke 用可乐清洗厕所

It’s amazing how powerful Coke might be as a toilet cleaner. Instead of drinking it, use it to clean the bowl! You’ll save your health by not consuming chemicals that this beverage contains and save money by not purchasing professional cleaners. Pour some cola over the stains and leave it all for a few hours. Then flush the toilet!可乐清洁厕所的能力不容小觑。它除了是一种饮料，还能清洁马桶壁的污垢。用可乐可以免受化学物品对身体的侵害，相比其他清洁品，可乐性价比高。用可乐浸泡污垢数小时，然后一冲即可。

2. Removing Water Stains With Orange Peels 橙子皮去水渍

Wait a minute! Do not throw away those orange peels. After eating your citrus you can use the skin to clean stainless steel. Your appliances will sparkle again after you rub them with the orange skins. The peels can easily make those stubborn streaks vanish in a second. This is how you can clean faucets and various appliances.等等！不要扔那些橙子皮，享用完橙子肉以后，你可以用橙子皮去除不锈钢上面的水渍。用橙子皮反复摩擦水渍处，不一会儿就这个器具又闪闪发亮了。橙子皮可以让这些顽固的污渍瞬间消失。你可以用来清洁水龙头或是其他器具。

3. Coffee Filters For Fusting 用咖啡滤纸来除尘

Daily or weekly dusting is a boring process. It might cost you quite some money – dusters need to be replaces on a regular basis after all! Change your attitude to the routine and save your money. From now on you can use coffee filters to remove dust off the TV, ceiling fans and shelves. We usually buy coffee filters in bulk. They are economical and safe to use on various surfaces. Try them out on your screens, monitors and other devices.每日或是每周的除尘，让人觉得乏味疲惫。而且也可能花费不少哦，因为除尘用具要定期更换。改变你的定势思维，来省钱吧。现在开始用咖啡滤纸来给电视机，吊扇和架子除尘。通常买咖啡滤纸都是一大盒，它们经济、安全、作为除尘使用面广。它们可以用于你的屏幕，显示器，或者是其他设备。

4. Banana Peels For Polishing Leather Furniture 香蕉皮能让皮具恢复光泽

Experts claim that banana peels are great for polishing leather sofas and armchairs. Banana skins are rich in oils and have the right texture to do the task. They leave no streaks and scratches. Leather upholstery can be wiped down with banana peels. Afterwards, remove the leftover residue with a microfiber cloth. This trick is simple and cheap. Use it if you want your leather furniture look brand new again.专家称香蕉皮是让皮质沙发、扶手椅恢复光泽的神器。香蕉皮含丰富的油脂，而且材质也非常适合皮质的擦拭，使划痕和褶皱统统不见，香蕉皮可以清理皮具，之后可以用纤维布擦拭，又方便又便宜。用香蕉皮让你的皮具焕然一新。

5. Making Your Own Glass Cleaner 自制玻璃洁剂

Why would you want to buy glass cleaners when you can make your own product that is cheap and non-toxic? Just pour 2 liters of lukewarm water into a deep bowl. Then add 50 ml white vinegar and half teaspoon of dishwashing liquid. Stir well and then fill up a plastic spray bottle with the mixture. Use it to clean windows and mirrors. Make your glass surfaces clean and shiny.如果可以你可以让自己的玻璃制品清洁无毒，干嘛还要想去买个玻璃清洗机？自制清洁剂，只须在一个深碗里放上2升温水，加50毫升的白醋和半茶匙液态清洗剂，充分搅拌均匀后，把液体灌入一个塑料瓶，然后可以用来清洗玻璃和镜子。让你的玻璃制品表面光可鉴人！

声明：本双语文章的中文翻译系沪江英语原创内容，转载请注明出处。中文翻译仅代表译者个人观点，仅供参考。如有不妥之处，欢迎指正。

title: 用橙子皮可以洗餐具？用可乐居然还能……

description:
《标准美音模仿秀》是一档沪江社团的原创口语互动节目（戳我去参加社刊>>），主持人截取30秒左右的英语音频，然后对音频进行重点讲解和示范模仿，并对大家递交的口语模仿作品进行一对一的点评，想要练习纯正美音的童鞋赶快行动起来吧！去沪江社团订阅本社刊！

今日主持人：Felix不想打酱油
